name: A Shot in the Dark (jlandron)
description:
<<>>

This game is still early in development and has no 3d models built yet. Once I polish the core game play loop I will work on adding models and more effects. 

Things I am working on: 
Implementing points system for speed/kills

Adding weapon purchase system 

Adding more levels as well as level types(Boss levels/wave levels/time survival levels/puzzle levels)
